AI Decisioning Platform
## AI agents that give every customer the exact experience they need
Rip up your campaign calendar and turn off your A/B tests. Unleash AI agents to experiment on a 1:1 basis and quickly unlock growth in LTV and loyalty.
![](https://hightouch.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Faccordion-1-bg.aa176d9a.png&w=3840&q=75&dpl=dpl_7p7ix5gRQGP65c2wYVSLKQriovUi)An abstract illustration depicting three users, John, Amy, and Nate, each with a series of personalized push notifications, messages, text, and more being sent out at custom times with AI decisioning.
### AI decides the best content to send
AI Decisioning pulls from your content library and matches messages with each customer based on their probability of taking an action.
![](https://hightouch.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Faccordion-1-bg.aa176d9a.png&w=3840&q=75&dpl=dpl_7p7ix5gRQGP65c2wYVSLKQriovUi)An abstract illustration depicting three users, John, Amy, and Nate, each with a series of personalized push notifications, messages, text, and more being sent out at custom times with AI decisioning.
### Set your goals and guardrails
Define rules to make sure you only reach the customers you want, at frequencies and with messages that meet your brand standards.
![Illustration of UI rule selections for timings and related outcomes. The timings rules have various items selected in regards to frequencies, days of the week, and times of day. The outcomes show two columns: names and classification. Some rows include purchase, best, and unsubscribe, worst.](https://hightouch.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Faccordion-2.3c1a53a4.png&w=3840&q=75&dpl=dpl_7p7ix5gRQGP65c2wYVSLKQriovUi)
### Test and learn across every customer
AI Decisioning studies how customers react to every message, updates millions of predictions and surfaces insights on patterns in a dashboard.
![Illustration of AI Decisioning dashboard for an apparel retailer. ## Hightouch is an extension of your data warehouse
[The Composable CDP](https://hightouch.com/</platform/composable-cdp>)
![Flow between the the data warehouse, Hightouch as a Composable CDP, and user's integration ecosystem.](https://hightouch.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fcomposable-cdp.fb646d71.png&w=3840&q=75&dpl=dpl_7p7ix5gRQGP65c2wYVSLKQriovUi)
### Leverage your existing data
Hightouch is built around your data warehouse. It brings a full set of CDP capabilities to your existing data investment without requiring any change to your tech stack, copying of data, or introducing security risks.
### Use all of your data, not just “CDP data”
Traditional CDPs are limited to user and event data. With Hightouch, you can leverage all of your data, from any source, with infinite look back and the flexibility to create complex relationships.
### Keep control of your data
Hightouch doesn’t store your data and offers advanced governance features, version control, support for multi-region cloud deployments, and more.
### Free your data team for high-value work
Secure, self-service access to marketing data keeps data engineering and data science work as the priority - not servicing endless tickets and A/B test readouts.
## We don’t store your data
Hightouch is more secure because no duplicate storage is required. Instead, we simply read from your data warehouse, where your data stays safe and sound.

## AI agents that give every customer the exact experience they need
Rip up your campaign calendar and turn off your A/B tests. Unleash AI agents to experiment on a 1:1 basis and quickly unlock growth in LTV and loyalty.
![](https://hightouch.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Faccordion-1-bg.aa176d9a.png&w=3840&q=75&dpl=dpl_7p7ix5gRQGP65c2wYVSLKQriovUi)An abstract illustration depicting three users, John, Amy, and Nate, each with a series of personalized push notifications, messages, text, and more being sent out at custom times with AI decisioning.
### AI decides the best content to send
AI Decisioning pulls from your content library and matches messages with each customer based on their probability of taking an action.
![](https://hightouch.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Faccordion-1-bg.aa176d9a.png&w=3840&q=75&dpl=dpl_7p7ix5gRQGP65c2wYVSLKQriovUi)An abstract illustration depicting three users, John, Amy, and Nate, each with a series of personalized push notifications, messages, text, and more being sent out at custom times with AI decisioning.
### Set your goals and guardrails
Define rules to make sure you only reach the customers you want, at frequencies and with messages that meet your brand standards.

## Hightouch is an extension of your data warehouse
The Composable CDP⟨106⟩
![Flow between the the data warehouse, Hightouch as a Composable CDP, and user's integration ecosystem.⟨107⟩]
### Leverage your existing data
Hightouch is built around your data warehouse. It brings a full set of CDP capabilities to your existing data investment without requiring any change to your tech stack, copying of data, or introducing security risks.
### Use all of your data, not just “CDP data”
Traditional CDPs are limited to user and event data. With Hightouch, you can leverage all of your data, from any source, with infinite look back and the flexibility to create complex relationships.
### Keep control of your data
Hightouch doesn’t store your data and offers advanced governance features, version control, support for multi-region cloud deployments, and more.
### Free your data team for high-value work
Secure, self-service access to marketing data keeps data engineering and data science work as the priority - not servicing endless tickets and A/B test readouts.
## We don’t store your data
Hightouch is more secure because no duplicate storage is required. Instead, we simply read from your data warehouse, where your data stays safe and sound.

generated_description:
**Hightouch Overview**

Founded in 2019 as part of Y Combinator's S19 batch, Hightouch is a data activation platform based in San Francisco. The company, which started with the goal of syncing customer data from data warehouses to business tools, has quickly emerged as a leader in the realm of Reverse ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) solutions. With a team of around 100 employees and led by Group Partner Gustaf Alstromer, Hightouch aims to bridge the gap between data storage and actionable insights for business teams.

**Mission and Vision**
Hightouch’s mission is simple yet powerful: to streamline the way businesses use their data. By allowing users to easily sync data to over 250 tools, Hightouch empowers marketing, sales, and customer success teams to make informed decisions based on real-time insights. This is not just about moving data—it’s about transforming that data into personalized, relevant customer experiences.

**Key Offerings**
1. **Composable CDP**: A customer data platform built atop existing data warehouses, allowing for flexible and secure data utilization without the need for extensive infrastructure changes.
   
2. **AI Decisioning**: Hightouch leverages artificial intelligence to personalize every customer interaction and optimize marketing efforts on an individual basis, eliminating manual intervention.

3. **Customer Studio**: A no-code interface that facilitates audience building and journey orchestration, enabling teams to craft targeted marketing campaigns with ease.

4. **Campaign Intelligence**: Insights into customer data and campaign effectiveness, providing teams with crucial analytics to enhance decision-making.

5. **Identity Resolution**: Resolving customer data into unified profiles without the need for technical expertise.

**Recent Developments**
Hightouch recently secured $80 million in Series C funding, bringing its valuation to an impressive $1.2 billion. This investment signifies strong investor confidence in their innovative approach to data activation.

**Target Audience**
Hightouch serves a wide range of industries, including retail, e-commerce, media, finance, healthcare, and B2B SaaS. Their solutions cater to various business teams—ranging from marketing and advertising to data operations—making them a versatile partner for companies looking to enhance their data capabilities.

**Conclusion**
In a world where data is the new oil, Hightouch positions itself as an essential tool for businesses striving to turn vast amounts of data into actionable insights. By enabling a seamless flow of information from warehouses to operational tools, they not only enhance productivity but also help companies create personalized customer experiences that drive engagement and loyalty.

For more information, visit [Hightouch](https://hightouch.com/).
